Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO; с англ. — «Контрудар: глобальное наступление») — многопользовательская компьютерная игра, разработанная компаниями Valve и Hidden Path Entertainment. ... Игроку доступны разные режимы игры, меняющие условия поединка между командами, а также игра с ботами.
A nice mode to spend free time when outside is boring :)

CSGO PLZ BUT CSGO BACK TO BUY THING SO THIS GAME WILL LIKE COST 16EUROS SO THERE WONT BE HACKERS THAT MUCH PLZ VALVE

First and foremost the game is good and yet at the time you feel down.

As per my thought, ever since the release of Valorant, a rival game of CSGO; the developers have made an effort to bring out new operations such as Shattered Web, etc and have even removed the functionality of having a bot in game which is good as when a player gets kicked irrespective of his skills or status the current playing team can't use his spot; rather they get additional funds to compensate for the loss of their player. However this still doesn't feel fair to players who is still trolled in game by other players and gets kicked out of his/her match for no apparent reason. I think the kicked out player should get the option to decide whether his team gets additional funds or not within a two minute time span. Like that kicking of players could be reduced.

I'm saying this as I have played this game for nearly 1.5 hrs and yet there are too many trolls within the game. 

Nonetheless, if you have a team consisting of good friends then I'd say the game's very fun to play. Infact, the game lets you talk to random people around the world where you can learn more from them and vice-versa. You even get to learn a bit from their culture if you interested.
